meanings.definition: Capable of being jumped over or across.
meanings.sent1: The small fence was jumpable for the energetic puppy.
meanings.sent2: The hurdle on the track was easily jumpable by the athlete.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo found the jumpable fence quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made the seemingly impossible task jumpable.
meanings.sent5: The jumpable gap between the buildings was a thrilling challenge.

meanings.definition: Able to be leaped over or across.
meanings.sent1: The stream was too wide for the horse to find a jumpable spot.
meanings.sent2: The wall was just high enough to be jumpable by the agile cat.
meanings.sent3: The jumpable distance between the rocks made the hiker chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made the daunting task seem more jumpable.
meanings.sent5: The jumpable gap in the bridge required a leap of faith.
